statements: SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT user_id, question FROM survey_responses WHERE answer = 1;
SELECT question, answer FROM survey_responses WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, question, answer FROM survey_responses WHERE user_id = 200 AND answer IN (1, 2) ORDER BY question ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM survey_responses WHERE question LIKE '%satisfaction%' AND answer = 5;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT response_id, question FROM survey_responses WHERE answer > 5;
SELECT user_id, question, answer FROM survey_responses WHERE user_id = 2 AND question LIKE '%satisfaction%';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM survey_responses WHERE answer BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY response_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(answer) AS highest_answer FROM survey_responses WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT response_id, customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM SurveyResponses WHERE satisfaction_score > 5;
SELECT feedback FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_id = 10;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM SurveyResponses WHERE satisfaction_score < 3;
SELECT nps_score, nps_category FROM NPSData WHERE nps_score >= 7;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE satisfaction_score > 4 ORDER BY customer_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, feedback FROM SurveyResponses WHERE satisfaction_score < 3 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE feedback LIKE '%complaint%' ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT nps_score, nps_category FROM NPSData WHERE nps_score >= 7 ORDER BY nps_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score, nps_score FROM SurveyResponses JOIN NPSData ON SurveyResponses.customer_id = NPSData.customer_id ORDER BY satisfaction_score ASC, nps_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT question, score FROM survey_responses WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, question, score FROM survey_responses WHERE score > 5;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 2;
SELECT survey_id, nps_score FROM nps_scores WHERE nps_score < 4;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE score > 5 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM survey_responses GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_responses > 3;

SELECT customers.name, survey_responses.question, nps_scores.nps_score FROM customers JOIN survey_responses ON customers.id = survey_responses.customer_id JOIN nps_scores ON survey_responses.id = nps_scores.survey_id WHERE nps_score >= 9;
SELECT question, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM survey_responses GROUP BY question HAVING average_score > 3 ORDER BY average_score DESC;
SELECT survey_responses.id, survey_responses.question, customers.email FROM survey_responses JOIN customers ON survey_responses.customer_id = customers.id ORDER BY survey_responses.id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT survey_name, survey_description FROM Surveys ORDER BY survey_id DESC;
SELECT nps_id, nps_score, comment FROM NPSData WHERE nps_score BETWEEN 6 AND 8;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses ORDER BY survey_date DESC, rating ASC
SELECT survey_name, survey_description FROM Surveys WHERE survey_id = 3
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM Customers INNER JOIN SurveyResponses ON Customers.customer_id = SurveyResponses.customer_id WHERE rating >= 8

SELECT customer_name, survey_name, nps_score FROM Customers INNER JOIN SurveyResponses ON Customers.customer_id = SurveyResponses.customer_id INNER JOIN NPSData ON SurveyResponses.response_id = NPSData.nps_id
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT user_id, survey_score FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_score > 8;
SELECT user_id, survey_score, comment FROM survey_responses WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT category_name FROM nps_categories WHERE nps_score < 6;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY survey_score DESC;
SELECT response_id, user_id, survey_score, comment FROM survey_responses WHERE survey_score >= 8 AND user_id = 2;
SELECT users.name, surveys.survey_type, nps_scores.nps_score FROM users JOIN surveys ON users.user_id = surveys.survey_id JOIN nps_scores ON surveys.survey_id = nps_scores.survey_id;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, survey_type FROM surveys WHERE survey_date >= '2022-01-01' AND survey_type IN ('Customer Satisfaction', 'Product Feedback') ORDER BY survey_date ASC;
SELECT nps_categories.category_name, nps_scores.nps_score FROM nps_categories JOIN nps_scores ON nps_categories.nps_score = nps_scores.nps_score WHERE nps_scores.nps_score BETWEEN 7 AND 9;
